data.title: Journal of Business and Psychology

Eden B. King, Rice University, Houston, TX

Steven G. Rogelberg, Chancellor's Professor, University of North Carolina-Charlotte, ...
data.text:
Co-Editors-in-Chief:

Eden B. King, Rice University, Houston, TX

Steven G. Rogelberg, Chancellor's Professor, University of North Carolina-Charlotte, Charlotte, NC

Senior Advisory Board:

Russell Cropanzano, University of Colorado at Boulder, Boulder, CO; Angelo DeNisi, Tulane University, New Orleans, LA; Michael Frese, University of Giessen, Germany; Timothy Judge, The Ohio State University, Columbus, OH; Gary Latham, University of Toronto, Toronto, ON, Canada; Anne Marie Ryan, Michigan State University, East Lansing, MI; Sheldon Zedeck, University of California, Berkeley, CA

Associate Editors:

Derek Avery, University of Houston, Houston, TX; Chu-Hsiang (Daisy) Chang, Michigan State University, East Lansing, MI; Malissa A. Clark, University of Georgia, Athens, GA; Patrick Converse, Florida Institute of Technology, Melbourne, FL; Lilia M. Cortina, University of Michigan, Ann Arbor, MI; Jason Dahling, The College of New Jersey, Ewing, NJ; Reeshad S. Dalal, George Mason University, Fairfax, VA; Jeremy Dawson, Sheffield University Management School, United Kingdom; Gloria González Morales, Claremont Graduate University, Claremont, CA; James A. Grand, The University of Akron, Akron, OH; Eric Heggestad, University of North Carolina, Charlotte, NC; Sam Hunter, University of Nebraska at Omaha, Omaha, NE; Seth Kaplan, George Mason University, Fairfax, VA; E. Kevin Kelloway, St. Mary's University, San Antonio, TX; Laurent M. Lapierre, University of Ottawa, Ottawa, ON, Canada; Nale Lehmann-Willenbrock, Universität Hamburg, Germany; Juan Madera, Conrad N. Hilton College, Houston, TX; Russell A. Matthews, University of Alabama, Tuscaloosa, AL; Adam Meade, North Carolina State University, Raleigh, NC; Susan Mohammed, The Pennsylvania State University, University Park, PA; Christopher Nye, Michigan State University, East Lansing, MI; Ernest O'Boyle, Indiana University, Bloomington, IN; Julie Olson-Buchanan, California State University, Fresno, CA; Christopher C. Rosen, University of Arkansas, Fayetteville, AR; Enrica N. Ruggs, University of Houston, Houston, TX; Aaron Schmidt, University of Akron, Akron, OH; Winny Shen, York University, Toronto, ON, Canada; Kristen Shockley, University of Georgia, Athens, GA; Scott Tonidandel, Davidson College, Charlotte, NC; Stephen Zaccaro, George Mason University, Fairfax, VA

Guest Editors:

Tammy Allen, University of South Florida, Tampa, FL; Frederik Anseel, Ghent University, Ghent, Belgium; Boris Baltes, Wayne State University, Detroit, MI;Sandra Fisher, University of Applied Sciences, Germany; William Gentry, Highpoint University, High Point, NC; P.D. Harms, University of Alabama, Tuscaloosa, AL; Crystal Harold, Temple University, Philadelphia, PA; Michelle Rae Hebl, Rice University, Houston, TX; Michael Horvath, Cleveland State University, Cleveland, OH; Cornelius J. König, Universität des Saarlandes, Germany; Christian Vandenberghe, HEC Montréal, Montréal, QC, Canada, Sheldon Zedeck, University of California, Berkeley, Berkeley, CA; Jonathan Ziegert, Drexel University, Philadelphia, PA
